website_summaries.verdict: Modern technology meets classic style in the Ariat Spitfire. With a slip-on style and add-on laces, this shoe can jazz up both dress-up and dress-down outfits of people who are always on the go.Styled with a distinct silhouette, it is among the sneaker boots that are an epitome of support, fashion, and stability. With all the perks it offers, it has a price tag that is reasonable enough.
pros: A lot of users have praised the Ariat Spitfire for the incredibly on-feet comfort it provides, even for people with foot problems like bunions
A pair of sneaker boots are unbelievably lightweight, which some customers did not expect
Several wearers have applauded the excellent heel support that the mid-top Ariat Spitfire offers
Like other Ariat sneakers, it has a versatile design that can jazz up both casual and dressy outfits
Some reviewers have shared that the Ariat Spitfire provides excellent cushioning
It has a soft leather upper, according to a couple of testers
According to a couple of reviews, the shoe’s EVA midsole provides flexibility,
The mid-top Spitfire by Aria has a Duratread outsole that offers excellent traction, which several users have testified
cons: A couple of wearers have complained that the Ariat Spitfire provides no arch support
The shoe’s medium width size feels wider than usual, according to some reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Too big and wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: First of all these are pretty large. I ordered a size smaller than what I normally wear and they’re still too big. They’re also made in China. Very disappointed in Ariat for that. They’re also much darker in color than the picture leads you to believe. Over all I’m pretty disappointed and I am sending them back and buying a similar pair from Twisted X. I recommend you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Too Big, shipping was ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: After waiting 2 weeks for the product to get here they were big, way big, if he went a half size down they would probably fit in length but the ankle is huge, for a larger man, rather than return I will pobably give to my day. They did seem a bit cheap, like they wont last long, I normally love Ariat and my son has all the same size 11 in Ariat boots, these are just not accurate. I do know that the Twisted brand was more sturdy, quality material, cost more but in my opinion will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review on PRODUCT reviews
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely very comfortable. I am 5’11 163lbs narrow feet high arch. Casual. So far durable and comfortable. If someone doesn’t state their weight/ height discard their shoe review. Large people wear shoes out differently. If they do not state what the shoe is used for also, discard their review. Construction and farming wear shoes out differently. If there is a problem with shipping, etc., that has nothing to do with the product, review the product not your current emotion. I recommend this shoe. I Have received several unsolicited compliments on the shoes. Order a half size smaller as others state. I’m buying a second pair for work, true 5 stars granted- ON THE SHOE.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a month now and love them. I ordered them a 1/2 size down as suggested in other reviews and they fit perfectly. These are extremely comfortable and don't overheat your feet. The quality is good and they seem to be holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Coastie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Love the feel and look...just a tad long though. I'm always a size 12 (except Nike) but definitely would get an 11.5 size if I could've tried them on in a store. My advice, down size a half inch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A HOT shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is HOT literally, yes it is comfy and overall a BIG shoe, feels like a pair of uggs or an ankle high snow boot. Get some socks that can stay dry if you get this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nice Casual Boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are like a low key / casual work boot. Great quality and fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Major Comfort reporting for duty.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot! Darker than picture. One of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever had on my foot. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: FITS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: COMFORTABLE.. FIRST DAY WEARING THEM FORGOT THAT I WAS WEARING BRAND NEW SHOES.. THIS IS MY SECOND PAIR.. WORE THE OTHERS FOR OVER A YEAR AND THE ARE STILL WEARABLE SHOES
customer_reviews.author: pete krause

customer_reviews.title: wasnt right for us
customer_reviews.text: husband didn't like how they fit so he returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Too light and cheap made
customer_reviews.text: Too light and cheap made, I was expecting something much better quality, also the size is way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Kubba

customer_reviews.title: Highly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m not big on leaving reviews; however, these are the most comfortable boots I have ever wore in my life. Sizes fits exactly as any other boot or shoe. They are slightly darker than the picture in color but high quality. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: J Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband says these shoes are the most comfortable shoes he owns.
customer_reviews.author: farrar08

customer_reviews.title: Husbands new favorite work boot
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality! Water resistant. Works great outdoors. Looks great ... the list can go on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in length however there is sagging around the area of the toes that detracts from the overall look of the shoe. They are comfortable but not as tough looking as the image depicts due to the toe of the shoe being as loose as it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and they love them! Super light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: A little large.
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the large side. May want to half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits good. Didi run about half size big, but I wear thick socks. Ordered 10.5R. Coulda went with 10R. Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear 11 but the 10.5 fit really well. Even after few day of wearing them working etc.. they still have great fit ( snug) so order down a size to have the best fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome shoe, very comfortable and light. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gene P Casterlin

customer_reviews.title: Flag is backwards
customer_reviews.text: Like others suggested, I ordered a full size smaller and they’re perfect. Only concern is that the American Flag is backwards. I probably would have returned but pants cover it.
customer_reviews.author: S Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoe. Love all my Ariat boots and shoes
customer_reviews.author: steven m koontz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé had been eye-balling these for forever, so I finally purchased them for him for Christmas. He loves them! Says they are very comfortable and I think they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot ever.
customer_reviews.text: These Spitfire boots are amazing. Have the feel of a moccasin but taller. Comfortable for all day. I think they will break in even better. Run a little big, I normally wear 10.5 in Ariat stuff, 10 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I received exactly what was represented
customer_reviews.text: I would usually need a wider width but with a little wear these should be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day late but super comfortable and fit just right
customer_reviews.author: tisha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shows are very comfortable. Great for walking on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: minecraft is the best.

customer_reviews.title: Style
customer_reviews.text: I liked to comfort support n style of the product
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rutherford Jr

product_meta.title: ARIAT Men's Spitfire Patriot Western Boot
product_meta.description: For anyone drawn to unbridled freedom; for those who know independence; who live out loud, outside the lines, and outdoors every chance they get. For every untamed spirit, Ariat is for you.
feature_bullets: Soft full-grain leather upper and/or printed fabric upper
Rubber outsole w/ multidirectional tread and forefoot flex grooves
